ISSUE.TITLE: You can't pick users when you only have permissions to edit your own content.
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: You can't pick users when you only have permissions to edit your own content. ### To Reproduce I have a content type "Project" with a user content picker field. I'm only authorizated to edit my own created projects. When I create a new project I currently can't select users with the user picker field. ### Expected behavior I should be able to select users when I have the permission to create the content item (in this example "Project"). ### Proposed fix https://github.com/OrchardCMS/OrchardCore/commit/f8fab3c2f8c5a606080b5333f70f949dcbb7a790 ### Screenshots ![select users bug](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/4984029/174396532-059b4b54-9798-4399-ab92-7f133215896e.png)
